attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: First there was 9/11, then 7/7 & now we have the events of today in London & Glasgow. When will the government realize that we have let terrorism in our own back door? It is time the British public stood up & said NO to religious attacks & stood firm in our beliefs. We are British - we have sovereignty & we have faith. We will survive. But now the government needs to understand that there are now racial divides. We need immigration rationalized & illegal immigrants deported. NOW! Our country is at risk…

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
